runs large

This could be a great dress if i owned it and tailored it to fit me, but I’m just not in love love with it to take it to that level just yet.
This is such a cute dress and the back cutout makes it absolutely dreamy. It does run a bit large though, so you might consider sizing down. Otherwise, this one might be a keeper!
This was the perfect coat for the end of the winter season in Chicago. Warm, but not too warm. The blue fabric is beautiful.

I didn't realize I had ordered a petite and I wish I hadn't. Everything was slightly too snug and the sleeves were just a bit too short. That didn't stop me from wearing it though! It was really cute and was good for the weather transitioning to spring. I also loved how deep the pockets are.

I ordered the petite xs and it was still a bit long for my taste but I fell in love anyway. Lovely texture, super warm, easy to layer with and for once in my life I wore a jacket that fit my shoulders and arms properly. Would buy it if it weren’t just a tad too long on me but definitely plan to rent again!!

Received so many compliments on this coat. Fairly warm, good for 40 degree weather or cooler if you layer up. Only downside is the hood. It is absolutely massive. My husband told me I looked like a sith when I wore it up.
Got lots of compliments on this jacket. It's heavy and warm but also very stylish.

I was kind of disappointed, after reading the reviews, I was expecting some fabulous piece to show up. This was an awesome, statement-making coat.
Perfectly warm, beautifully constructed. Gorgeous coat, and trendy enough to replace after a month and not feel guilty. The details were very beautiful, material was great quality. Very happy.

links_reviews_title: When you love a coat so much...
links_reviews_text: ...that you rent it multiple times! This coat is so comfy and stylish I can’t get enough of it. I wonder if it will end up in my Nuuly next month too....

links_reviews_title: The best coat I have ever had
links_reviews_text: Stunning coat, warm and comfortable. And getting me complements everywhere I went. I would buy this piece.

Beautiful jacket- warm too

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous! Just don’t pair with a lot of layers underneath

A must try! The detail on the jacket are better in person

This jacket was beautiful but a bit big. Even though I ordered the petite size, I felt like I was still swimming in it. Otherwise I got a lot of compliments on it and loved the detail!

I loved this jacket!!! It was great for early winter in New England. Fit was oversized, but there is a drawstring in the inside to make it more fitted. Easy to fit an extra layer under. So so so many compliments.

I LOVED this jacket and got so many compliment!!! This jacket is so soft, warm and unique! I also love that it has big pockets so I didn't even need to carry a purse when I went shopping. But definitely worth renting!
I loved this coat! I’m 4’10” so it hit mid-calf on me, but it was perfect for cold days. The material is high quality, and the lining (likely fleece) made the coat durable for the wind.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed does not begin to describe it.

This is a great jacket. It’s a bit crazy yet also subtle. Fun piece to wear a few times
reminded me of a calico cat in person and a bit too heavy for California winter
Really loved this jacket. Stylish and warm. Very fun
Great Statement Jacket. Comfy and easy to dress up or down.
Unique jacket and got compliments on it when i wore it out. Fit was a bit tight but i ordered the petite and i probably should have ordered the regular size.
This jacket fit, but it was pretty bulky and looked cheap, imo.
honestly loved this coat. actually very warm. i got so many compliments. 10/10 recommend. fits TTS.
It is so pretty in the picture. The quality is fine. It you are not a waif you will look like an ogre.

links_reviews_title: fly jacket, received tons of compliments every time i wore it

I really wanted to like this coat. It’s got kinda oddly high shoulders and basically no collar. Just looked weird.

Cute warm coat. Loved it!

This jacket is cute, but it’s not a show stopping piece I absolutely had to add to my wardrobe.

Loved it so much I kept it. Very soft and luxe. It's a head-turner. Impressed that it was thick enough to keep me warm in snowy-Alberta Canada!
I loved this jacket. The colors and fit were perfect. I wore it and got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!

Love this a lot! Would like to rent it again in a XS. The small fit fine, but felt a bit like a child wearing their mother’s coat.

I wore this jacket with leather shorts and a bodysuit with heels. It was the perfect complement to the outfit to add a layer of class. Will definitely rent again.
Material inside is a bit stiff, but fits true to size. Outside is super soft and cozy. Lots of compliments.
Wore this on multiple occasions, used as a coat mostly. SUPER WARM and a great piece to layer over all black1
Really love this jacket. I get so many compliments on it. Really soft to the touch also. The green color is definitely more vibrant in person than in the photos.
The jacket is good for end of winter, not super warm but good for weather in the 50s with a long sleeve turtleneck underneath
More of a gun-metal color & a light weight vest perfect for that winter-spring transition weather. Although it had a cheap feel, it was durable and I loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: I cool update to a classic

This was such a statement vest that kept me comfy and warm - love!

Cute vest, a little shorter than expected
Color was a little darker silver in person. Feels a little cheap, but was fun and cute for wintertime!

This shiny vest is not super warm, but was fabulous during this mild month. i wore it a ton over fun colorful sweaters- got tons of compliments and loved the ease and style. if it was a little less $$, i'd have loved to keep it!
This was perfect to add over my workout gear before a workout class or over a fun sweater with sneakers. I am obsessed.

links_reviews_title: fit well, not too big as appeared in picture. cozy and cute

Sooo soft

super cool for a night out when it's not too cold

links_reviews_title: Seemed nice, but sleeves were too short

thought I would like it more, just wasn’t my style When I tried on

Cute, good simple piece.

I wanted to die in this coat I wore it for 3 days it is soo soft, warm & not to warm just amazing

Very bulky looking

Unfortunately I did not get to wear this jacket because something is going on with the weather in my state but I loved looking at it on myself in the mirror! :)

links_reviews_title: So, so cute but fun large
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved these jeans!!! I wore them a ton. The zipper details were amazing. They run large though - I’d size down twice

I liked these pants and wore them a lot. They are a basic staple and very functional. They are flattering on. The waist fits a little low and the fabric stretches out so I felt like I was constantly pulling them up. I kept thinking I should try them with a belt, but never remembered- more a throw on item than a thought out outfit for me. The length was ok on me, 5’6”, but on the short side. I wore with higher booties. The ankle zippers were very cute.
ran small.
These were a good mix up for me, but they stretched out over the course of the day so I was hiking them up by the end of the day.
Loved the zippers on the back

links_reviews_title: Good but lower rise than expected
links_reviews_text: Great on the first wear but got baggy quickly and sat a little lower than expected
Love the look but go a size down. The waist band stretches out a ton with wear.

I usually wear a 26P/2P and these fit perfectly. They were a bit more low rise than my taste (preference is high rise) but they were so cute on and paired well with booties. I loved the zipper design too because it made my outfits a bit edgier.
True to size
Exactly as pictured. Good long sleeve for layering and making an otherwise dark outfit have a pop of color.
Cute simple shirt that is easy to pair

I already own this mock neck in olive....and love it SO MUCH that I had to rent the pale pink. It is ribbed and fits on the tight side. It's the perfect length -- not cropped but hits right at the waist. I love pairing these with high waisted looser denim. It is tight-fitting so I would size up if debating between sizes.

I loved this!! It was tight to the body, the perfect length to tuck into high waisted jeans, and the sleeves were the perfect length. It's lightweight so it's great for layering or for chilly-but-not-cold weather. I know it comes in other colors elsewhere, so I wish Nuuly carried those too!
pair with something fun
I thought this would be a simple basic but i didn't end up wearing it once. It felt very young and unflattering.
this was just like the picture. Cute color and stretchy fit. Good staple piece for layering too.
Super cute. Flattering. Looks just like the photo. I ended up purchasing it because it was such a staple in my closet. Wore it under jumpsuits and on its own. Great fit.

I really loved this piece! Contemplated keeping it, but I may just have to rent it again another time. Color is really pretty, material is nice and stretchy..only downside was that I’m usually a small/medium so it fit a little snug, but it looked really cute tucked into some high waisted pants. Definitely a good find!
This top was cute and super versatile!
This top is great!

I figured this top would fit me very tightly, and I was right. But the material is great, very soft and thin, so it's not hot. I like the mock neck too, it isn't close to your neck. I wore it tucked into jeans and it looked super cute. I might keep this one! Perfect light pink color too!
Very comfortable and got a lot of compliments
basic, super soft and comfy. Great for layering in cold weather. The fit was a little large, even for me and I have a large chest. Size down.

Loved this top. Looked great with jeans or tucked into a skirt (since it’s tight it sits under skirt lines well). The color is feminine and pretty. Overall a good everyday top. Only concern was that the sleeves were a little short - but I’m 5’10” so that’s pretty normal!
It fit exactly how I wanted it to. Wore it as a casual top

This is a really great basic shirt that can be styled many ways. I ended up wearing it a lot mostly with blue and washed black jeans. It's very stretchy and comfortable and not see through if you wear a nude bra.
Super soft, great with every outfit from under overalls (super cute!) to tucked in with high waisted jeans it’s the perfect winter essential!!
super cute, fit just right, long enough to easily tuck in, will likely purchase!
Super cute and simple, I wore it the most out of everything I ordered cause it was so easy to style. So soft too!!

Loved this! It was so comfy casual. I wore it on a trip and it was great for a few different temperatures. Loved the oversized look. Nice and cozy. I almost bought it but with it almost being spring, I figured I would hold off.

Much heavier and warmer than I would have thought which was great in the colder months. Very cute but definitely boxy. I have wider shoulders so it made me look a little top heavy. Would likely be really cute on anyone with a smaller top-half.
I have been putting off buying a sherpa jacket but now I might have to buy this one. I wore it so many times, especially going out and grabbing dinner when I didn't want to wear my parka.

Wish I had gone down one size - this one definitely runs big. I ended up wearing it over leggings and chunky sweaters for a casual look but it swallowed me up. The dark denim also looks a little too worn out so I don't think I'd try again in a different size. Fun to try on a couple of times though knowing I could return it.
I wore this jacket to death! The slightly oversized fit adds a bit of edge to any outfit and I absolutely loved it! Def will try to rent it again!

This jacket is amazing and goes well with everything. It is so comfortable and good for daytime and even evening if paired correctly. I definitely recommend this. It is true to size and has a bigger look so definitely do not size up.
I got so much wear out of this jacket! Tempted not to return it, but I want to try it a size down before committing. I absolutely loved this one!
The jacket is warm! But it fit a little boxy and made me look bigger than I am.

I had read reviews that this jacket ran large, so I ordered a size S. The jacket fit me, but it was an awkward fit with how boxy the jacket is. I wanted this jacket to work so badly! If I order again I will order a size up, but I don’t know if that will help with how boxy it is. There’s definitely potential with this jacket, it’s just a matter of finding the right fit.
This coat is really cute but very large. I will definitely order it again but in a smaller size.
Couldn't button it, but actually sized up. My torso is long, as I'm 5'10", and it fell above my hips, so looked short and boxy.

I've been wearing this jacket on the daily. It's got a super cute oversized look that you can dress up or down! It's super on trend in Denver right now and I'm seriously considering buying it so I never have to give it back!! If you want something more feminine and fitted this probably won't match your style, but I've been wearing it with flowy pants and Doc Martens and it looks super trendy!!
I tried this in a medium and it was too large, ordered in a small and it was perfect I’ve already worn it a ton and love it.
I lovedddddd this jacket. A great layer that I immediately began wearing every day. Had to buy it. 10/10 recommend!
I love this jacket and I know it's meant to be oversized but it runs really large. Will probably try renting again in a smaller size.

I loved this jacket so much I ended up buying it. It fit perfectly with a slight oversized feel to it. It didn't feel too big but there was plenty of room for a sweater or other layering pieces under it. Loved it!

This jacket was fun to have! However with it being fur lined it was a bit bulkier than I was expecting. It was warm which was nice but I felt like it was a bit too big/bulky for all occasions. Definitely more of a casual style jacket
Levis is a classic for many reasons- their sherpa jackets prove this fact! Boxy fit is to be expected. Great for fall and spring. Love the worn-in look and feel of this piece.
I have a larger bust so buttons peaked open a teeny bit, wasn’t an issue. I wore it with shirts under just in case but this was ADORABLE. I miss it so much already hahah

Loved the idea of this sweater and sized up (I'm usually a small or medium and I got the medium in this case) but it is still super cropped. Was hoping to wear for work, but seems a little to casual being so cropped.
This was such a Feminine cardigan and perfect for work. I would size up if between sizes but this is meant to fit snug. The puff sleeves are so perfect and this purple is so pretty!

I was not able to wear it buttoned up unfortunately. I really wanted to wear this more but it did not look as cute to me unbuttoned. I forced myself to wear it to work one day and it was cute with a skirt and white tank, just not the vibe i was aiming for. I would size up if possible.
Liked, didn’t love enough to buy, but would rent again in the spring!

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs tighter than expected
links_reviews_text: Love the color but the buttons were popping open and spreading apart on me - which never happens to me because I have a very narrow ribcage and wear a size 32b/c bra.
I loved this little sweater! Turned out to not really be my style as I didn’t wear it as much as I thought I would, but glad I got a chance to rent it.
Not great for someone with a larger chest, gapes a lot at placket.

This top was so cute, but the buttons were puckering. So I never ended up wearing it out. I am by no means large in the bust (32B). However, I'm going to rent a size up in my next Nuuly because I loved the cut and color so much.
It is small in the bust area.
Stands out. Comfortable, nice fabric
Loved this little number. It’s an updated basic that pairs well with so many things. If busty I recommend sizing up due to buttons pulling.
This is the cutest sweater ever! It’s fun to wear and it evolves happiness

This was one of my favorite items that I rented! It’s super cute & unique. I received soooo many compliments on it! I only wore it once because it’s more of a statement piece, but I highly recommend renting it.
Just so much fun. Threw on multiple times a week with denim & always felt better than just a plain sweater. Cozy & thin enough for layering.
Made me smile every time I put it on. Will rent again.
The fit of this sweater was perfect, and it was so cute with jeans. Sometimes fringe can be overwhelming, but this didn’t detract from the structure of the sweater.

I wore this with jeans and booties. It was cute and made an ordinary day feel fun and whimsical. It looks exactly as it does in the picture. It's not too heavy so it was nice and warm without being overkill.

This is a super warm, comfy sweater. The colors and the hanging fringe-y things make it really unique & playful—kind of perfect for those in-the-offfice holiday parties where you don't really want to dress up but you want to look festive. It is very linty though so I would suggest not wearing it with anything that attracts fuzz. I wore it with a leather skirt & again with jeans.
The neckline was so odd, made it unwearable
I just loved this! My husband, on the other hand, said it looked my toddler made my outfit!

Unfortunately due to quarantine I was never able to wear this skirt out. The material is very high-quality and I think sizing down worked fine for me. It's a really unique style I'd try renting again when we're allowed out of our houses.
This skirt is beautiful and I received so many compliments while wearing it. However, I wish I sized down because it was definitely big on me.

Everything I read said size down. I'm typically a 6, and rented a 2... and still probably could have rented a 0!! But it still worked, I was able to wear this to a concert in Nashville and just felt fabulous! It's so fun, and so so soft. I was very happy with this. If it wasn't so memorable, I'd wear it a lot more!
I really wanted to wear this skirt but it just was too big!
I really was excited about this skirt, was a bit disappointed by the fit, I found it to be a bit loose.
It is so fun - so cool - and SO FLATTERING. I wore a turtleneck bodysuit with it and got compliments EVERY TIME.

This was a cool skirt. The fringe moved amazingly and was fun to walk around in. The sizing ran WAY too large though. I'm often a 14 in pants and I got a 12 but wished I had gotten an 8 (I'm 5'11 and 170 lbs, though blessed with a fairly small waist). The 12 was just barely wearable and sat way too low for my taste. Still, I liked this so much I might get it in the smaller size next month.
This skirt is unbelievable. I would totally buy it, but the size 8 was too large for me.
This skirt is gorgeous! Unfortunately, I got a size 2 and it was way too big in the waist. I wasn't able to make it work outside of dancing around my room with it on :(

I hope it rains more! I love the nude color and it has a hint of Lisa Frank to it which I’m usually not wild about but I love it with this! Not warm but a good spring/summer rain coat. I might buy or rent again when it rains. I’m a true medium and went with small/med and it’s good

links_reviews_title: OMG, where did you get your raincoat?!
links_reviews_text: Never thought I would be so obsessed with a raincoat. This was one of those items that I wore over and over again. So, naturally I bought it. It doesn't rain often where I live, so I don't own a rain jacket, so I was excited to try this one because we had a lot of rain in the forecast. I got stopped so many times by girls asking where I got it from. Its tan color is simple but there is an iridescence to it that you don't see in the photos that makes it eye catching. Oh disclaimer, it is a light coat, no warm lining underneath so not the best for cold weather.

links_reviews_title: it never rained - but this is cute
links_reviews_text: It's cute. The color will wash you out, but it could be worth it. It is VERY light. Not even a good fall or spring coat -- made for summer.

links_reviews_title: Works well in the rain and received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It is a bit over-sized which is fine, but fits great!!
This rain jacket was adorable and functional - kept the rain off pretty well! But it's just a thin rain jacket, so I wore layers underneath it to stay warm in the rainy London winter.

I borrowed this to lend to My sister whilst she visited me in Seattle. It fit her great (she is a small). You can’t tell from the picture but it actually had a pearly rainbow sheen too it, kinda reminded me of unicorns. So it’s much prettier than you’d think. It kept her very dry, but at one point there was steam coming out from her body. So it doesn’t ‘breathe’ at all really but it absolutely kept her bone dry. Give it a go you might like it.
Super light and good for travel. However, it ran large on the shoulders and sleeves for me.

I wanted to purchase this but I didn’t try it out enough to commit. I don’t know if I’ll like how shiny it is; it seems a little hard to dress down. It’s pretty thin and the darker color is more for a special night out or colder climate, so I’m not sure I’d wear it enough. The size was perfect but not with a lot of bulk underneath

links_reviews_title: Adds some pizazz to a rainy day!
links_reviews_text: Great length, flattering.
Didn't get a chance to wear it but it was super pretty! Elegant dark gray. The sleeves were a little long for me but had a snap to keep them up.

links_reviews_title: Chic rain coat for California girl
links_reviews_text: I am so glad Nuuly offers rain coats. I looked polished in this coat even when its down pouring outside. Living in California, it doesn't make sense for me to purchase a quality rain coat only to take space in my closet 350 days out of the year. I saw this month had a lot of rain in the forecast and I am glad I got it.

Super stylish, honestly looks like I am on the runway when I wear it. The material is very smooth/silky, and I wore it many times when it was raining in Maui and it did a great job of protecting me from getting soaked. I am gonna keep this one in my closet. Thanks Nuuly!

The material is super nice and I loved the way the top fit, but it is just so long! I couldn't figure out how to wear it. It can't be tucked in because of the ruffle and it's so thick. It just looked like I was wearing a dress over pants.

Loved this and wore w brown ankle booties. Wore pasties, or a bralette. And booty shorts. I’m 33 chest and the XS was fine. The tie at the bag made it all adjustable and I’m so short I wore it as a dress. 5’ 100 lbs. got lots of compliments every time.
So cozy and warm. Was an ESSENTIAL for quarantine.

links_reviews_title: I never want to take it off.
links_reviews_text: Its so soft, so comfortable, fit was perfect for me. Love Bowie, and fun item to add some levity to this time.
This was great for keeping a style edge while stuck inside in quarantine. Loved it and was super comfortable.

This was the best sweatshirt. I highly considered buying it, if it wasn't so expensive I would have. I love the retro look of this, with the "Bowie" writing slightly distressed. It is a longer fit, which I found perfect for leggings wear. But the bottom is tight enough it will stay up if folded underneath. I absolutely love this, will be renting again.

I wanted to wear this everyday. Such a good non-basic basic. I wore it like I would a white t. The only reason I didn't buy it is that I want to try it in a size up. Very warm, very soft. The length is awesome (and i have a long torso) but it was pretty fitted on me, and pretty thick, so just curious what it would be like a little roomier.
Long - but fun and comfy

I'm a huge David Bowie fan. (My cat is named Bowie) so this caught my eye while browsing. I'm so glad I got it. I wore it a ton. The medium was a bit larger than I would usually go but it still looked cute baggy. I would get a small if I rented it again.
Loved this! Wore it nonstop! Comfy and trendy.

links_reviews_title: great for WFH while social distancing!
links_reviews_text: this does run big, should have ordered the small but I hate when sweatshirts are tight. it's much less white than it looks, more dark ivory. but very comfy
I really wanted to like this sweatshirt, but the fit is so narrow, I couldn't style it without feeling awkward! :(
Shape of this sweatshirt is a bit long and narrow, made styling it a bit awkward but the cool factor of the Bowie concert logo made up for that!
Runs true to size. A little tighter compared to a big loose sweatshirt
Super cute
Cute sweatshirt that I wore to hockey game and weekend get together. It’s just a fun piece to wear.

Super cute graphic and off-white color, I received many compliments! However, the fit was not cute. It was neither fitting nor boyfriend oversized, just somewhere in the middle. Made me feel a little frumpy, which was too bad.
This looks shapeless and it is gigantic.

David Bowie was definitely strange. But does that mean this shirt should have such a strange fit?! Tight through the waist and enormous everywhere else. Mind you, I have a very small waist, so I managed to get a couple wears out of it, but I can’t say I recommend this sweatshirt. Oh, and it’s very bulky, too. Disappointed.

It's not cropped like it looks in the photo. But I didn't mind, I french tucked it with some leather pants and was also able to wear it over leggings with sneakers for an athleisure look. Will definitely rent again!
Cutest, comfy and cozy. Fit really well not super baggy/slouchy like your typical sweatshirt. Could wear with skinnies and booties to work even.

I ordered this sweater knowing it wasn't vintage but hoping it would, at least, look vintage. Well, it did not. While it was in brand new condition, it looked liked something you could pick up at Target. The brand of this sweater is Sugarhigh and Lovestoned so I know this is an expensive-ish label but I was very disappointed. Had I known it looked the way it did, I would have passed on it.

The vintage Bowie graphic caught my eye so I wanted to rent this for lounging over the holidays. It is soft fleece lining which was cozy, but overall this does run large. I rented my normal S, and I had to cuff the sleeves and tuck the hem up so it didn't look like a dress. Worth renting, but I'd suggest sizing down.

Had high hopes for this...I’m a big Bowie fan, and while the arms and chest area of the sweatshirt fit great, it was WAY too long. Like a tunic or dress. Judging by the pictures, I thought it was cropped, but it was very difficult to style with skirts and high waisted jeans.

After reading the reviews, I went with an XS. As a taller person, I'm glad I sized down, because the fit was pretty good, if a little long in the body and sleeves. Nothing a French tuck into jeans, and one roll on the sleeves couldn't fix. Color was a little more vanilla/beige than the white it seems in pictures. Cozy and soft fleece inside.
Truly not sure who this would fit well.
The shoulders are very very very roomy. It was a fun look worn over skinny jeans with high tops. A less cury gal love this.

First off, this sweatshirt is great quality. Very soft and cozy. However, it’s looooong. Longer than a tunic length; it’s like mid thigh length. I’m short- almost 5’2”- but based on the way it fits on the model, I would not expect it to be so huge. My family laughed at me when I tried it on. They are mean.

I usually wear xs/s so I got the S in this one to make it look more casual and I feel like it fit closer to a M. The sleeves are SUPER long. I have long arms and if I don't scrunch them, the sleeves went way past my fingertips. Very soft on the inside and loved the graphic though!

links_reviews_title: Second time rental on this one - love this shirt
links_reviews_text: I got this one again to help keep me out of the covid funk. I wanted an interesting fun top to wear on conference calls and I got it. Is a close vs. loose fit. I may end up keeping this one for next year. Love it.
I liked this blouse a lot. I have to dress formally for work and was excited for this unexpected pattern, but never really had a chance to wear it.
I really liked the print and think this would have been perfect for work. The material felt low-quality, and unfortunately the arms were too tight and the buttons gaped. I need to size up!
Pretty and light fabric but obvious fall or winter graphics. Fits nicely, if in between xs/s, go for small. Wore it with the pink corduroys and jeans.
A lot of people loved this top, but I just didn't feel like it was me. It was fun to wear. I sized up, for a more comfortable fit.
Perfect with a green leather midi skirt I already had

I was thinking this would be a shirt that could be work and weekend, but despite the pattern the cut and fabric felt more formal than I imagined. HOWEVER- this was a really cool shirt and I did get a ton of compliments on it at work. I would rent this again
Love this top! Fits like a form-fitting cardigan almost. Considering buying!
Every time I wore this piece, I got SOOOOOO many compliments. Loved this shirt.
I didn’t realize this had buttons, still very cute. But didn’t work well for a larger bust. I ended up wearing as a cardigan style with it up buttoned.
Loved the pattern, but the fit was a little bit boxy and short. I ended up wearing it tucked into a high waisted skirt, but couldn’t wear it with jeans
The fabric is a little scratchy and the fit is a bit boxy, and fits matronly. Received many compliments on the print, though.
Cute print! Details seemed a little unfinished - no cuffs for slv. Got lots of compliments though!
Styled this top with denim but it also looked cute tucked into skirts! Wore it to work a few times and out with the fam for on the weekend.

links_reviews_title: Interesting pattern, but fit left something to be desired.
links_reviews_text: I really liked the pattern on this sweater, but had a lot of trouble with the fit. I don't have much of a bust, but it still was too tight on the chest, which caused gaping between the buttons. The buttons themselves were very difficult to fasten which made it tough to get on or off. The fit also wasn't very flattering, leaving a boxy shape. I recommend ordering a size up and tucking it into either a skirt or pants to give it more shape.

Truthfully, I thought this was a mock neck and I was disappointed to see it was a button down (I should have paid more attention!) That being said, it runs TTS but is very boxy. Great pattern, but the boxiness really takes away from it.
It fit well. But it really wasn’t my style once I selected it.

This blouse feels high quality, looks very professional. Pair with relaxed jeans, tucked halfway. Wear with high waisted pencil skirts for a professional work look, or with skinny jeans untucked for something more casual. I love the creepy cute print!

I wore this with jeans to a holiday gathering then with a pencil skirt to work. Received lots of compliments. Only downsides are that it wrinkles easily and there was some gaping between one set of buttons across my chest.
i was really excited for this item but it was a weird length and boxy fit. it couldn't tuck into clothing well but was unflattering untucked as well. the sleeves are also a little tight
This shirt was soooo darling. It was the right amount of cute with just a little bit of creepy. I paired it with high rise Levi’s- polished yet fun
Cute with dress pants or jeans. The fit was great.
The print was amazing, the fabric and fit not so much

Must have gotten a hundred compliments on this blouse. The only thing is that it was tight in the bust (I got an XL and am a 40D) and the elbows get very wrinkly. I wish they had just one size larger because it’s so gorgeous and unique.
Love this blouse. Fits great, looks amazing with everything and always get compliments because of it’s unique print.
I loved this top and got lots of compliments on it. It was also definitely a conversation piece which was fun.
This was cut supershort and was tight in the arms. A little bit weird I’m not sure what body type this sure it was meant for.

I have fairly long legs for my height (5'6) - wasn't wild about where these hit between the shin and ankle. They also seemed to run a bit big, but I probably could have gone with a 30. Generally cute, just not my style.
I love these pants. I've gotten them in multiple colors. So comfy, flattering and cute!!!!
I think these run true to size, very good stretch for corduroys! Nice soft pink color went with a lot during late winter and early spring! I would have bought if we had cooler spring!

I wasn't sure about these when I first tried them on because they were kind of an in between length - too short to be ankle length and too long to be cropped. But I guess that is what culottes are?? Anyway, I got past that and ended up wearing these a lot. So comfy and the rust / orangey color was great (although March was about the last time I could wear this color - better for fall / winter vs. spring).

I knew I would like these cords, but from the first time I put them on, I was in love. Sometimes I worry cropped pants will look silly on me because I’m tall, but these were the perfect length. They are super stylish and fit perfectly. They’re also extremely comfortable, so they’re great for casual days but can also be dressed up for work.
I love cords and I was happy that they were on the thinner side, so this was an easy transition piece into spring. I'm 5'4" and it hit me right at the ankle (which is what I was hoping for).
I love these pants. If you are in between sizes I would size up. They held their shape really well, and went with everything.
I wear Paige Jeans and I ordered same size in these cords. Barely zippered, could not wear. Would suggest sizing up a size or 2 for better fit!
These pants were great! They were really comfortable because they have stretch in them and were flattering because there is no front pockets adding bulk.
Love these pink pants! Fun and girly!

What's not to like about big pink pants? I wore these a lot in the month of February, to work, to an engagement party, and on Valentines day. I received many compliments. My only complaint would be that there are no front pockets.

The fit of these pants was just not flattering on me. if they were higher waist they might have worked better. Also the color was super unflattering. I think a darker color that would have helped, too.
This pants are super cute, however even though they stretch A LOT, they were still a little too tight to be comfortable. I wore them once.
Wore these to church, out on the weekends, overall easy to throw on pants!

links_reviews_title: What you see is what you get
links_reviews_text: Love these pants. Everything is exactly as it seems. Super comfortable, fit great and I worth them a ton and received a ton of compliments. Definitely recommend these.
Obsessed. So flattering and cool. Will be buying.
I ordered these for the month of Feb and wore them several times. I received a bunch of compliments on them!
The color is amazing! I’m a true 25 and it fit just right at the waist. It felt a 2-3 inches too long for me, but I still tried to make it work.
so flattering, so comfy, so many compliments

I really was hoping to love these. Sadly the fabric while thick is also kind of thin. You could seem every bump or jiggle while wearing these. The length is not meant for shorties. Not long enough nor short enough.

I'm 5'1" so I was nervous that these weren't going to be cropped on me but the length was perfect. I could've maybe fit into a size 26 but I'm glad I got the 27 because I was on vacay, so needed the tiny bit of extra room for drinking and meals if you know what I mean. And yes, I paired it with the same blazer the model is wearing and basically styled an identical outfit. Got lots of compliments! Highly recommend!
Liked these! Comfortable, but I wish the waist were higher.

These pants are pretty much perfect. I ended up wearing them a TON and would have purchased if not for the price. Super comfortable, versatile rise, didn't slip down throughout the day, just enough stretch to fit. The golden orange color is vibrant but really easy to coordinate with. I also liked the medium-wide wale of the cords. The only thing that would have made them better is front/side pockets in addition to the back pockets. I'm renting these again.

I love these cords! High rise. Lots of compliments. Comfy. Mine were definitely washed a few times by previous wearer and it showed, but I still loved them! I needed a smaller size. I typically find that Paige runs small, but these cords were the opposite.
These pants were perfect for a fall look. I paired it with a brown and red patterned turtle neck and it was the perfect thanksgiving look
I had a lot of compliments on these Culottes. They are a little snug but relaxed within wearing a couple hours.

These were cute but long on me - they didn't touch the floor, but they would have looked a lot better had I worn them with heels - which i don't really wear - or if I was just taller. They were fun to try and different from what I normally wear, but I didn't love them.
I liked these but wanted to like them more. Just not as flattering as some other pants like this. I still wore them a few times. Comfortable and cute nonetheless.

these fit great and received a ton of compliments when I wore them. The rise was just right and the wide leg was pretty darn cute. I wore the pants pretty casual each time - sneakers and a T-shirt. Would rent again.

This robe is so huge and the fabric is very scratchy. I would say to size down 2 sizes, if possible. I had trouble trying to pair this with anything without looking like I was wearing a sleeping bag.
So bad! Super itchy, scratchy material and a crazy-large fit. Not in a chic, oversized way, either!
Fun dress! I’m 5’4 and I needed to wear heels since one side is much longer and didn’t want it to drag but it was great with heels!
I loved this dress! I wore it with a leather jacket and some combat boots and I got complements all day. Not to mention it is super comfortable! It’s a winner for sure
I got so many compliments on this. Purchased!
Gorgeous dress. I wore it to a function and got so many compliments. The fit was a bit large, so I’m glad I sized down.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful/fun dress but not for big boobs
links_reviews_text: Beautiful/fun dress but not for big boobs
Its super pretty and really classy, but it runs big in the boobs and is a bit saggy in the arm area

links_reviews_title: So cute - do NOT go down a size!
links_reviews_text: Super disappointed in the other reviews making me think I should go down a size! It’s definitely on the smaller side. I’m 155 and 5’8” and normally a medium, but should have got a large. It’s soooo gorgeous and well made. I wouldn’t rent this dress if you are super busty unless your boobs sit up on their own! Lol
I’m not even sure a medium would have fit me and I’m always a small or XS. Would have been a great party dress.

I took a gamble with the sizing and ordered a size up, because I didn’t want it to be too short (I have a hard time at my height with length). The bust in a size small was too big for me, it has built in cups and it would probably be a better fit for a size 34 c / 34 d (I have a really narrow rib cage). I didn’t wear it out, but It looked really cool against the backdrop of my Airbnb! I love the 80’s vibe with the modern cut
Like the reviews said, it was a bit big in the chest area, but still felt secure. The sleeves do slip a little, but not a big deal to me.
This dress was very sexy. I loved it but it would be hard to wear with a coat due to the sleeves. I ended up wearing a longer dress as my event was on a cold night.

links_reviews_title: The top doesn't hold the girls up!
links_reviews_text: I loved the look of this dress, and even at 5'9" I didn't think it was too short. Def on the shorter side, this isn't a dress to go see your family in. More of a birthday/club/party dress. However, the top just doesn't stay up at all! I have a 36C chest and my boobs are very perky, this top is heavily lined with no support and it just wouldn't even stay up when i was standing still. My roommate tried on, who has a small B chest, and wouldn't even stay up on her chest either. I think you would have to be completely flat chested to even consider this dress!

I wore this for a New Years party and I loved it! I felt beautiful, and achieved the edgy yet timeless look I was going for! It fit well all around. The bust area may be a bit large if you consider yourself small on the smaller size chest wise, but nothing a little push-up can’t fix! I opted for braless which it is well equipped for with padding and shape built in. Hope you enjoy!

I was really hopeful to wear this for New Years, but it was so tight and unflattering. I hoped it would showcase my curves, but instead it made me feel like I was in a sausage casing. Envious of whoever is able to enjoy this gorgeous dress!

Unfortunately, I didn’t get to wear this dress. There were no reviews at the time so making my decision between an XS and S was tough. Nuuly was great though and refunded me for the item and also suggested to reach out and ask about a particular item if no reviews exist. I ordered a S and the chest area was too big. Since it was strapless it was falling forward in the chest area

links_reviews_title: Tight on the bottom huge on the top
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this dress, but you would have to have a much larger bust than body to pull this off. It fit perfectly on the body and was really gaping at the chest. A size smaller would have been too small on the hips and tummy area. Just didn't work for me, but such a cute style!
This was the perfect dress for a holiday party! It fit perfectly and I received tons of compliments. Loved the neckline. The sleeves add flare to a classic little black dress.
Wore this on NYE and was so uncomfortable the whole night. Got a lot of compliments, but it was just way too big on my chest to feel confident.

links_reviews_title: Great quality dress but very large
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fabulous - I wore it for NYE! Although, I wish it was true to size. It was extremely large in the chest area.

So bummed I didn’t get to wear this for New Years. I’m a size 4 but I ordered a S and I was drowning in it. Wished I could have exchanged sizes in time. I was concerned the dress would be too short on me, but it was a very appropriate yet flattering length which made me even more disappointed that it was too large. Definitely planning to order it again when an occasion comes up. Also, the sleeves weren’t too big. They fit comfortably on me, but I have twiggy arms.
I didn't have the occasion to work this and the sleeves were a little too feminine for me. I love the cut of the dress and wish I could've worn it without sleeves. It's super cute flattering dress.

Wore this to a formal holiday party, and got a ton of compliments. The sleeves are a bit precarious, and don't look as nice as in the photos. I ended up pulling them up a bit higher than the model and that helped. One of those pieces that makes renting worth it!

Absolutely beautiful dress. Very well made and received so many compliments. Sleeves stay right where they are supposed to but you still have flexibility to move your arms. You won’t be able to wear a jacket over the sleeves though.

Rented this as an option to wear to a holiday party and I am SO glad I did! It was perfect for the occasion and also so comfortable. Only complaint would be that the chest area is a bit big for my flat-chested body, but the material is more rigid at the bust so it still felt secure.

I was really excited about this dress and it is a great dress but didn't fit me properly and I suspect that it would be a difficult dress to wear well. I rented a medium and it was falling off the whole night.

Thought I was going to love this but it just didn't work for me. The fit wasn't consistent throughout, and I couldn't get the rouging to fix the too loose areas. I mistakenly sized up and should have gone with a medium- maybe then it would have fit better. The quality is nice though and I like the concept.
I loved the way this sweater looked on the model (a bit loose and slouchy), but in person it was extremely unflattering and bulky. Not an ideal shape for straight body types.
Super fun color block!! I got a lot of compliments on this item!! It was a smidge itchy but ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ nothing to wild! Still a 5 star sweater :)
This sweater was really big on me, but I wore it anyway. Got a few compliments. I think my sweater had seen better days, as it looked a little worn. If I got it again, I would definitely size down.
Great oversized fit and soooo comfy.
Oversized fit

This sweater is oversized intentionally so keep that in mind. I went for my true size and like the bigger fit with jeans. IMO this sweater is the perfect thing to rent instead of own... its very unique so people remember when you wear it. Great to wear a couple times and then send back. Got a lot of compliments and very warm!
Very cute sweater, lots of fun. Ran a little big, making it truly oversize. Can't complain though, it was colorful and comfortable.
I received a ton of compliments when I wore this. Had a 6 month bump and sizing was still totally fine.
This sweater got a lot of compliments. I felt warm and comfortable. I love it!
I lived in this sweater. It is oversized so you can hide in it, but the bright colors keep things upbeat. I felt arty without trying too hard.
It was cute but just a little too huge so it swallowed me up and was not too flattering
Great colors, comfy and cozy. Long enough to cover my maternity pants! Lots of compliments wearing this one.
Loved this sweater for lounging or running errands - a little too casual to wear to work though.
one of a kind
From the pictures it looks like it could be really thin fabric but it’s not! It’s so cute, cozy, and warm.

For me this sweater made me feel like a colorful Rubik's cube. Other people seemed to like it and I got compliments on it. I'm short so it was a moment where I tried the sweater on and looked in the bathroom mirror at work and felt decidedly not as cute as when I first left the house which then I felt far less confident rocking it. I only wore this item once as a result of the Rubik's cube revelation.

links_reviews_title: Fun and colorful - but funky fit
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this sweater because it's loud and fun, but the fit was a little weird. I sized down, since it looked like it ran large, but the hemline ended up falling at the widest part of me, while the neck came up too high. In all, it was just a little too boxy, even for a fun winter sweater. I wore it a couple times, but I'm glad it was a rental.
I seriously drowned in this sweater. I’m very petite and I looked ridiculous in it.
Oversized, looks great with leggings, but not so much with jeans.

Such a fun sweater. I got so many compliments on this the first time I wore it that I ended up buying it. It does run large and I wished I'd had a smaller size but ultimately it's a great cozy winter option!
Wore this so much, great for the airport or a chill day of running errands. On my short frame it was a bit longer than i usually prefer but I still liked it. Very warm

This looks much cuter on the model than in real life. I knew it would be oversized but IRL it's a bit overwhelming, and the style looks less colorblock, more Raggedy Ann, especially since the sweater is starting to pill a bit. Looks like something from a thrift store. Others might be able to pull it off, just wasn't for me

So it runs large, very large! I got a small and felt like I was still swimming in it. But it was sort of cute that way! A fun piece but not exactly figure flattering, as it was long and covered my booty like a tunic. would have been perfect if it was about 3 inches shorter.
I love the colors and texture of the sweater. It is perfect for winter and cold weatehr. However, it runs a bit large.
This sweater was a fun pop of color but runs a bit large - Depending on the look you're going for, you may need to size down.

Like everyone else said..this is a great statement sweater! In an effort to wear more color, I chose this piece and its perfect for that. I wear it with black vintage jeans and doc Martens and I got compliments every day that I wore it. Its definitely oversized but I loved that. Perfect for this transitional weather!

I like my sweaters to hit mid-thigh, and this one did! It's very cozy–mostly acrylic I think, so not scratchy, either! I'd give five stars but the sleeves seemed a little fuzzed/worn/pulled when I got mine!
Bright, bold. Cute and fun! Loose and long, which I liked.

links_reviews_title: Colorful but not as cute in picture
links_reviews_text: I’m sure brand new This sweater would be cool. The one I got was Kind of worn out.
This sweater was super cozy and cute. I wore it lounging around, but it was really long so didn't work with most clothes.
This was the greatest. I got compliments every time I wore it, which was a lot since it was so comfortable.

I loved it - the colors are just as they appear, the fabric is soft, and your real size should give you a loose but not too loose fit. I wore it with leggings and boots under a cropped down jacket in cold weather...probably a ridiculous style choice but it was really cold out so I had fun with it.

This sweater is cute in theory mostly. The colors are not quite the same as the picture, a little less vibrant, and the fit is bulky and not flattering. I like an oversized, cozy sweater, but this one just didn't fit in the right places.
Love love — it matches anything solid & denim and it’s perfect for NYC weather. Lots of compliments from my coworkers & friends.
I liked all the colors, it was a fun sweater but I didn't find it very flattering. I wore it to a brunch but was happy I didn't spend what it costs on it!
I wore this a lot, to work and not to work. previous reviews said it runs very large so i sized down 1 size and i wouldnt say that I was swimming in it but it was definitely still oversized.
This sweater felt so lived in and comfy! I've gotten so many compliments and have definitely been put on to the Moon River brand at UO and Asos.
Everyone loved this bright cheerful sweater. Its very oversized and fuzzy.
I love this sweater! It's really soft, and long enough that it works well with leggings or jeans. I have gotten compliments on it every time I've worn it.

You know when you get a lot of compliments but you’re not sure if it’s because the piece is so loud or because people actually like it? That’s how I felt with this sweater. Very bold, loved renting it because definitely not something you would wear too often. I usually wear a medium and ordered a medium but the style is definitely big/cozy so could size down if you’re between sizes. Liked this piece!

I ordered an xs hoping it wouldn't be as big, but it was still pretty large. If you like an oversized look I would recommend sizing down so it's not too big! It's still super cute and keeps me warm, I love it!

links_reviews_title: Love but runs large! Size down
links_reviews_text: The colors of this sweater are amazing. It feels very high quality and is super warm. I sized up from my normal medium because I wanted an oversized fit. Definitely didn't need to. Would recommend going with your normal size for an oversized fit or sizing down for something a bit tighter! Absolutely still love it. Also, it's rather long. I'm 5'11'' and the large hangs almost midway down my butt.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, a touch longer on us petite gals
links_reviews_text: These run small so if you're between sizes then definitely size up as they have very little stretch in them. Very high waisted which is what I wanted
I have a curvier butt and received a lot of compliments from friends in regard to the fit of these jeans. Ended up buying!

These were my everyday jeans during the month that I had them. They paired easily with everything. They were neutral, and not attention-grabbing, but looked and felt great. I would have definitely bought them, but I've been losing weight and exercising a lot, so by the end of the month they were already a little loose (went from 140 to 135 pounds in the month, so likely would go from a 29 to a 28 if that helps you with choosing your size).

I absolutely adore these jeans. The waist was just high enough and my butt looked fantastic any time I wore these. I’m somewhere between an 8-12 and most of my weight is in my bottom half, for reference. I was so surprised how durable I found these jeans and how much I love the material. I was so impressed I broke my rule and actually bought this pair!

links_reviews_title: Great jeans! A little small in the waist
links_reviews_text: These jeans are great quality! They run slightly smaller in the waist than most high-waisted jeans do...I have an athletic body type so high-waisted jeans usually solve the smaller waist and larger legs dilemma. These jeans fit perfectly in the legs for the straight, relaxed look but ran smaller in the waist. I was able to button them, and the waist stretched out gradually as I wore them but was initially more snug than I would like. 4 stars because the quality of the jeans was great but it ran smaller than other Paige jeans typically do.

I absolutely loved these jeans. The denim was so soft but never lost its shape or structure. I was worried at first that they were going to be too small (I'm either a 32 or 31 depending on the brand), but the size 31 loosened up just enough and were super comfortable. I wore these a ton and will probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: If they fit I might have liked them
links_reviews_text: I have several other pairs of Paige Denim in the same size, but these were too tight. They had very little stretch in them, so I'm sure that's why. It would be great if Nuuly put the actual breakdown of the fabric in their descriptions so that we can tell how stretchy they are. I wouldn't have ordered them if I'd known they were only 1% or 2%
I could barely button it, even though 30 is the size I go for when I want a looser fit. They look cute/high quality though

links_reviews_title: I wish I could give 7 stars
links_reviews_text: These jeans are ah-maz-ing! I’ve never worn Paige jeans before and you definitely can tell that there’s a huge difference in quality when you invest $$$ in jeans. I don’t know if I can go back to cheap jeans! These cut in all the right places and fit your butt perfectly. Loved them & I’m sad to return!

As someone who has a LOT of trouble finding jeans that fit (athletic thighs + butt but smaller waist) I was so pleasantly surprised by these jeans. I found myself wanting to wear them constantly! They may just stay with me :)
These jeans fit really well. Good high waist, fit great through the legs. My only complains it these are slightly less vibrant/indigo than I was expecting them to be so I didn't wear them often.

I really like these jeans and have been wearing them a lot. If the rise was an inch or so higher, I would probably have purchased them and had them hemmed (they are super long, but that's to be expected for someone who is 5'1). I normally wear a size 26, but based on other reviews, I sized up here and can confirm that was wise - these run a little smaller than other brands. Still, I found them to be well-made comfortable, and very flattering!
These are lovely. Fit great. Looked great.

I rented a pair of Paige skinny jeans and loved them, so I chose this pair to try next. They feel nothing like the stretchy jeans I had tried, and I was initially disappointed. I don't wear rigid denim, as I find it too uncomfortable for my curves. However, I gave these a chance and they do get more comfortable with frequent use. The fact that they're a harder denim also makes them look polished and stay that way throughout the day. I don't know that I'd keep these, but I'm glad I tried them. They're definitely a nice looking pair and easy to style.

These fit great. I'm short so they ran a little longer than they appeared in the photos, which was honestly nice because it helped keep my ankles warm. The quality of the thread in the stitches seemed a little subpar, and I could tell after a while they'd wear out. The wash was nice though!

links_reviews_title: Nice fit but wild about the wash
links_reviews_text: Cute straight leg jean that was full length on me. I would have worn them but I just wasn’t into the wash. I would have preferred something a little darker or more vintage looking.
Waist was tight so this would be better suited for someone who is curvy which I’m not. Also didn’t love the material felt a little stiff.
These jeans are amazing I just might buy them!! High waisted, hugs curves and fit like a dream. Love love them
Loads of compliments, comfortable and flattering.
Great dress and got lots of compliments. It took a minute or two to figure out how best to wear the waist bit but once that was figured out it was great!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but I’m not tall enough for it.
links_reviews_text: I’m not long enough waisted for the smocking to hit in the right spot

I've worn this dress TWICE and I've had my Nuuly for only a week. That's how good it is! It flows absolutely beautifully. This dress is art. I typically wear a size small but I went with the XS because with smocking, I always prefer a tighter fit.
Very comfy dress, overall great fit and look
it just fit so weirdly. way too big in the bust/neck area it just hung off me, but a smaller size wouldn’t have fit my shoulders/torso

links_reviews_title: More like a bralette than a cami
links_reviews_text: Did not even put on as this was more like a bra than a cami as it is described :( Wanted to wear for a holiday part with a open front jacket. Looks to be made of good quality, though.

links_reviews_title: This might be what some want, but not for me
links_reviews_text: This top is a mid-rift that hits above the bellybutton. I did not realize that when I ordered it. If you're looking for that, it is cute and well-made, albeit quite sheer. But this was not the kind of top I was actually looking for.
These were a little tight on me in my normal size. Definitely could have worn them but would have been uncomfortable..
These are sooooo cute but definitely run small. Even with sizing up, they were a little tight in the crotch area. Still pretty comfy though and actually very warm.
Wore these just about once a week. Second time renting these, super comfortable and flattering, they go with everything.
Great basic pant with a little twist. Beware there is NO stretch in these pants. I am usually a 28, they fit on my body but were definitely more snug than Citizens or Levis.
So soft and comfortable

I really liked these. They fit really great (started to loosen after a few wears). I liked the ankle-length finish. The velvet is soft and durable, and with the button fly makes them feel very rock and roll. I was able to wear these with just about everything in my closet.

These were good velvet jeans – I'm glad I got the chance to try a pair of velvet jeans, but the fit wasn't perfect. The other reviewers were right in that the waist was kind of an awkward height – not really 'high waisted.' My waist/stomach is the smallest part of my body and even for me it felt a little awkward to feel the jeans pushing into my stomach when I was driving. But overall I'm glad I tried them and would rent again for winter months!

These pants were super comfortable and fit true to size. I didn't give 5 starts because the belt loops were weirdly small, so two of my belts couldn't even fit in the loops. Also, the pants did stretch out slightly after wearing them for long periods of a time (not as much as pilcro or other pants do however).
These pants had no give whatsoever. I am normally a 27 but got a 28 and glad I did because I wouldn't have been able to wear these if not.
These pants were very cute but they also were very hot, temperature wise to wear. I felt like I was over heating in the restaurant and no one else thought it was hot.
These pants were fine, just not right for me. They felt tight on the hips and thighs but loose from the knees down. Probably work better for a straight figure.
These velvet Jeans were super comfy and I loved the button-up detail. They had just the perfect amount of stretch. I will say they were just a tad too long for my 5'2'' frame, but I still loved them.
These fit me perfectly all over and looked great. I wish I could keep these longer.
I personally couldn't tell from the image that these are velour, which they are. Not a very flattering pair of pants and I did not wear them.
Cute stretchy pants, very festive.
I think this style may not be too flattering on my pear shape. They are nice quality, and the buttons add some great flair.
Nice way to level up your jeans for work or dinner. Super comfy, true to size for Paige. Perfect winter staple.
These are velvet pants!! Wish that was in the description. They aren’t as high rise as I would like and sat kinda funny with the button fly. Not an everyday pant as the velvet catches a lot.
Tight in the waist and big in the legs. Strange fit.

I didn’t realize these were velvet pants when I ordered. It makes them very shiny and dressier than the solid black denim I thought I would be getting. Seemed to fit true to size. Very stretchy and soft material. A little lower in the rise than I like so the waist gave me some muffin top even though there was plenty of ease in the butt and thighs. Not the most flattering fit for me.
These pants were super comfortable and fit me perfectly. The velvet is a really nice shade of black and the waist was a perfect height.
Such a cozy sweater, wore it all the time!
Wearing this sweater was like wearing sunshine! Sweater had a nice thickness and weight to it. Paired nicely with jeans and flats.
Super cute but runs big, very wide in the waist

Loved this cheery, bright sweater to brighten up those gloomy winter days while keeping me warm. It was a bit thick, so it did not fit under my leather jacket, but was great to be cozy on colder days under a larger winter coat. Loved the colors though the fit was a bit boxy, so I'm glad that I got an XS instead of my normal S. Wore it with high-waisted skinny jeans (to balance out the boxy top) as well as a casual pencil skirt to work and with navy leggings on the weekend to the park with my kid. It worked well in all circumstances and got so many compliments on the colors

This was a great sweater to wear in dreary February. Lots of beautiful color. I wore this to dinner, to work, it was a favorite. Very soft. Would say that it did not me as slouchy as it appears in the picture- if you want it to be slouchy, I would say order a size or two up. I will order this again!
Definitely thicker than expected which made it cozier! Perfect for this winter to sprig weird transition time. The white didnt wash me out. Recommend!
it is not a fluffy texture. the material is very thick, made me looks very big.

This bright comfy sweater brought some much needed cheer to my life and those around me during this dreary winter. All day I couldn’t help but smile walking around looking and feeling like a ray of sunshine. Also it’s very soft and fit like a dream
I wore this sweater a bunch while I had it and every time I got multiple compliments on it. It is fuzzy and soft so I was super comfortable wearing it. Would definitely recommend.

My first box came today. Everything was great except this item. It was oversized but also from the side it turned me into a triangle — so it fully flared out in the front, that made me look pregnant with an angular belly. Definitely not for me. It did look nice in a tight cropped selfie — but I would say the v neck was the only redeeming quality for me.

links_reviews_title: I wouldn't wear it to work
links_reviews_text: It had been cleaned many times which was apparent because it was matted down (but still soft!). The bottom was very wide and stretched out. The colors were still very vibrant. I wore this to work once as we have a casual environment, but this is more of a weekend/laying around sweater.
I liked this sweater but don’t think it’s worth the price tag. Great rental piece

This sweater is beautiful in person, very vibrant colors to help you through the winter, but I had trouble pairing it and I did not like it with jeans as it is thin despite being warm. It showed belt loops. I think it might work well on someone who has a flat stomach. Not flattering on me, but did wear with leggings once.
Fun, bright, warm sweater but had a bunch of strings flying off of it.
The colors are beautiful. The sweater is very thick though. I don't think you could tuck it in like the model in real life.
Soft and comfortable. Nice Saturday sweater.
This is such a cute and cozy sweater! Comfortable, cute and versatile. Love wearing it!
Colors are way brighter than shown and it is extremely large. Did not wear it.
The sweater was a cute color, but the fit was too boxy for my taste. It also sheds like crazy.

It’s soft, runs large, and is warm, but in person the colors come off looking like you’re dressed as a furry candy corn which is weird. Especially in october when I ordered it. Hahaha. Might be a bit less reminiscent in spring or summer?

I rented this with the intent to wear at home (hoping it was actually awesome & could wear everywhere), but it was so big. I liked the butt coverage and length (a little shorter in front than back) but the shoulders were long and the armpit area huge. It also sheds everywhere; tough to wear with dark colors. A good couch snuggle.

very fun change of pace for a winter sweater with these sherbet colors! it is so soft and comfortable. It is definitely one that is already large and roomy, so don't size up- I'm normally a small or medium, depending on the brand. I was very glad I got the small.

I go so many compliments the few times I was able to wear this before stay-at-home went into place. It’s very soft and the colors are gorgeous. A few notes: sleeves are slightly short for longer limbs. Also, the fabric has a slight shine to it that you can’t see in the photo, I didn’t mind it but figured it’s good to know.

links_reviews_title: Love the colors and the fit!
links_reviews_text: I really loved this coat, comfy and warm. It does shed a little bit, so be wary if you are wearing black jeans.
I absolutely loved this piece. The pattern and colors and thickness are a LOT but the shades match polo and other shirts I wear a lot for work so I was able to wear this many times. LOVED it.

Love the colors of this jacket. It is incredibly comfortable as well. It is a bit boxy though as is pretty obvious from the pictures but... just something to note. It does have some good stretch to it so if you wanted something a bit slimmer fit I would size down.
I loved this so much I bought it. It's so unique, so WARM and I have received so many compliments on it.
soo soft !!
A bigger fit, you can size down
I wanted this to be a cute work blazer but it was pretty blah. Reminds me of something a grandma would have---and not in a cute way.

The cut was flattering. It was warm. I liked the color palette. On me I didn't super love the color palette the yellow was more prominent than I thought it would be and I also became aware that my closet has ZERO yellow. But overall I feel like this felt luxurious and well made.
Thought I would wear this all the time, it’s easy to style, loved the color. However, the fabric is way to shiny making it look too synthetic. Wore it once and didn’t like it for that reason.
I wasn’t expecting to love this one so much but it was so easy to throw on and dress up any plain outfit. Got tons of compliments. Wore over dresses, with jeans, and leggings.

Great jacket... I wore it with black jeans & a black turtleneck to work. It was versatile enough to be worn all day as a sweater, and heavy enough to work as a light jacket. The colors were bright and fun and easy to match. Thinking of purchasing it! Size is slightly large, but not enormously oversized. Loved it!

It’s super comfy and can be dressed up or dressed down. I loved the colors - found it very easy to match with. It was a great 3rd piece for a simple outfit. I wore it to work over a dress and on the weekend over leggings.
Loved the colors + texture... hated the collar and the short sleeves

I LOVED this coat - it was super soft and the colors are lovely. It does run big, I wished I had gotten a smaller size only because I don't usually wear things that aren't form-fitting. Even despite it being larger, I wore this everyday and loved it.
I wore this a lot. Once with black leggings and then just around the house on a girls trip weekend. I thought about buying it. It is a very versatile price and super soft.
Fun sweater blazer. A bit outside of my comfort zone but fun to wear for a week!
Love this sweater. So festive, received so many compliments.
Unfortunately have been working from home.

links_reviews_title: Never wore it but it felt nice
